name: Perilous Relics
description:
A metroidvania in which you can only hold one item at a time.  Made for GMTK Game Jam 2019.

Gather all 8 relics to beat the game.  Watch out for enemies, and collect pomegranates to restore health.  Don't die, or you'll have to start all over!

Controls:

A - Move left

D - Move right

W - Jump

S - Go down ladders

Space - Use ability

E - Enter door

Programming & Sound: Jackson Sweet

Modeling: Sam Martin
